edu.ncsu.csc216.travel.model.office

Class TourCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.travel.model.office.TourCoordinator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TravelManager

    public class TourCoordinator
extends java.util.Observable
implements TravelManager
    Implements TravelManager and represents the person coordinating tours, clients, and reservations. TourCoordinator provides the glue to coordinate the data for the backend model classes. The TourCoordinator maintains a sorted list of tours and a list of clients. Implements the Singleton, Observer, and Factory design patterns. Has methods to get an instance of itself, add new tours/clients/reservations, set filters, cancel reservations/tours, calculate the total cost for a client, get the list of clients, get the list of tours (with optional filters), get the reservations for a client or tour, get the name of the file associated with the system, load data from a file, save data to a file, flush all lists, and check whether or not the data should be saved.
    Author:
    Selena Chen, Alex Snezhko

                       int capacity)
                throws DuplicateTourException

        Parameters:
        kind - Kind of Tour (River Cruise, Land Tour, Educational Trip)
        name - Tour name
        startDate - Tour start date

        basePrice - Minimum per-person price
        capacity - Maximum number of Tour participants
        Returns:
        Newly created Tour
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any parameters are not valid

        Specified by:
        addNewReservation in interface TravelManager
        Parameters:
        clientIndex - Location of the Client in the list of Clients
        filteredTourIndex - Location of the Tour in the list of Tours restricted to the current filters
        numInParty - Number of participants for this Reservation
        Returns:
        Newly added Reservation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If either index is invalid
        CapacityException - If the Tour does not have the capacity to accommodate the Reservation

        Specified by:
        addOldReservation in interface TravelManager
        Parameters:
        client - Client for the Reservation
        tour - Tour for the Reservation
        numInParty - Size of the party for the Reservation
        confirmationCode - Confirmation code for the Reservation
        Returns:
        Added Reservation
        Throws:
        CapacityException - If the Reservation could not be established because of lack of capacity
